screen.title: Keystrokes Settings
screen.position-tooltip: Enables a grid overlay where you can move the HUD on the screen.
screen.show-movement-tooltip: If enabled, the HUD will display the movement buttons.
screen.show-mouse-tooltip: If enabled, the HUD will display the mouse clicks.
screen.show-spacebar-tooltip: If enabled, the HUD will display the space bar.
screen.hud-key-look-type-tooltip: Select how you want your HUD design to look like (WASD/Arrow Keys)
screen.rainbow-tooltip: Rainbow Mode will play a wave effect of all colors in the rainbow.
screen.text-shadow-tooltip: If enabled, the HUD text will show with a text shadow.
colorscreen.title: Color Options
colorscreen.text-tooltip: Color selector for the HUD text color.
colorscreen.click-tooltip: Color selector for when a key is pressed.
colorscreen.hud-tooltip: Color selector for the HUD background.
colorscreen.preview.title: Color Preview
colorscreen.not-show.title: won't show when Rainbow Mode is enabled.
keyscreen.title: Custom Overlay Options
keyscreen.reached-max: You reached maximum custom key bindings.
keyscreen.new-custom-overlay-tooltip: Click to add a new custom key binding overlay.
keyscreen.delete-overlay-tooltip: Deletes this custom overlay from the screen.
keyscreen.key-input-title: Press a key to add as overlay.
keyscreen.key-input-invalid: Pressed key does not have a binding, try again...
keyscreen.key-input-existing: Pressed key already has an overlay, try again...
